text:
📖The One & Only God📖 said:
 "ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ"
Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
-Surah Al-Alaq, Ayah 1
